plugin.name: musicbrainz
plugin.description: A TRM signature producer based on libmusicbrainz

element.name: trm
element.description: Compute MusicBrainz TRM Id using libmusicbrainz
element.author: Jeremy Simon <jsimon13@yahoo.fr>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/x-raw-int, endianness=(int)1234, signed=(boolean)true, width=(int){ 8, 16 }, depth=(int){ 8, 16 }, rate=(int)[ 8000, 96000 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]

caps.name: src
caps.details: audio/x-raw-int, endianness=(int)1234, signed=(boolean)true, width=(int){ 8, 16 }, depth=(int){ 8, 16 }, rate=(int)[ 8000, 96000 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]
